text.p: These are the leading stories in the Moroccan press on Saturday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Moroccan chamber of representatives to examine draft laws on new bicameral parliament on Sunday.
- A group of 12 Moroccan immigrants arrested in southern Spain.
- An offshore industrial area to be built in El Jadida, on the Atlantic Coast 120 km (75 miles) from Casablanca.
- Moroccan-Egyptian ties have improved in recent years.
- More than 800,000 expatriates crossed the Gibraltar towards Morocco.
- Europe remains Morocco's main foreign trading partner.
